a.title: COVID 19 Update
a.div:
The district has infectious disease protocols in place and has been taking steps, such as cleaning and disinfecting throughout our school to minimize the spread of viruses and a variety of other illnesses.
To learn more about what you can do, click on this block for a message from Superintendent Getchell and check resources for more information.

div.p: The Haines Borough School District will deliver a rigorous academic curriculum based on meaningful learning opportunities where students are empowered to be critical thinkers and contributing members of society. We do this through a rigorous academic curriculum that includes fine arts instruction, vocational education, and extracurricular activities.

The Haines Borough School District will foster a culture of innovation, respect and responsibility, attract and retain highly effective employees, and facilitate an environment of open and transparent communication.
The Haines Borough School District will partner with families and abundant community resources to promote shared values of intellectual, social, emotional, and physical growth.

b.u: School Climate and Culture of Excellence

div.p: The Haines Borough School District will ensure an inclusive and healthy school climate where students thrive in a culture founded on safety, respect, and responsibility.

a.title: Free & Reduced Lunch
a.div: Did you know your kids could get free or reduced breakfasts and lunches? Find out by filing out a simple form. This information can help add funding for school programs! Click this message to learn more.

a.title: School Awards
a.div:
Ranked as #3 Best School District in Alaska by Niche Website
2019 ALASKA ARTS EDUCATOR OF THE YEAR - Linnus Danner
US News & World Report
Best High Schools
Bronze Ranking 2018
REGION V PRINCIPAL OF THE YEAR
Principal Rene Martin 2018
AK STATE LIBRARY ASSOCIATION
SCHOOL LIBRARIAN OF THE YEAR
Librarian Leigh Horner - 2017
NATIONAL BLUE RIBBON SCHOOL
Exemplary High Performing School
Haines Elementary School - 2014-2015
ALASKA REWARD SCHOOL
Haines High School 2014-2015
TITLE I NATIONAL DISTINGUISHED SCHOOL
Closing the Achievement Gap
Haines Elementary School - 2012-2013
SPIRIT OF YOUTH AWARD
Haines High School Kid Wind Team - 2012

div.h3: Welcome to the Haines Borough School District

div.div: Our Mission: Utilizing the abundant resources of the Chilkat Valley and in collaboration with its communities, the Haines Borough School District empowers students to be contributing members of society and critical thinkers prepared for individual success.
Our Vision: The Haines Borough School District is dedicated to excellence in educating all students to achieve their full potential through actively:
*fostering a culture of inclusion that honors diversity and is founded on safety, respect, and responsibility;
*creating meaningful learning opportunities for intellectual, social, emotional, and physical growth;
*maintaining a healthy and supportive school community where together we thrive by demonstrating adaptability, resilience, empathy, and resourcefulness; and
*providing a rigorous academic curriculum, fine arts instruction, career and technical education, and extracurricular activities.

a.title: Visit Welcome to the Haines Borough School District Page

a.title: Community Education
a.div:
Have you met the new Community Education Director Ashley Pugh? She can help you keep busy on these long cold nights and maybe learn something along the way.
Check out all the amazing opportunities community education has available.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.

button.class: btn btn-default
btn sb-organization-color-element-bg

div.p: As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
